mapper.insert: insert into sys_home_module (id, page_code, `name`, sort, page_address, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_home_module set page_code = #{pageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, page_address = #{pageAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dep_code = #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, page_code, `name`, sort, page_address, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date, remark from sys_home_module where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, page_code, `name`, sort, page_address, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date, remark from sys_home_module
